titles.title: Ensuring American Leadership over International Standards Act of 2020
Ensuring American Leadership over International Standards Act of 2020

A bill to require the Director of the National Institute of Standards and Technology to commission a study on the effect of the activities of China on standards for emerging technologies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

bill.summary:
Ensuring American Leadership over International Standards Act of 2020
This bill requires the National Institute of Standards and Technology to contract with a nongovernmental entity to conduct a study on (1) the activities of China's government and China's industrial entities within international standards bodies, and (2) how such actions affect the development and setting of international standards for emerging technologies.
The entity shall report the study to Congress.
